words.defineEn: a type of clothing worn by people when swimming or participating in water sports

examples: - It'll go clean through a wetsuit bootie.

examples: The models are fresh-faced wearing body suits and basic tees and solid colors.
words.defineEn: a tight-fitting clothing in one piece that covers the upper body and bottom of a woman, usually stretchy and with sleeves
